issue.subject: Should not be able to add a price on a product with a pre-defined price (free or with profile)
issue.description:
When responding to an order manually, we can add a price (> 0) to a free product in the "request" view.
Same for a product with a pricing profile and a calculated price.
This should not be possible.

details.name: subject
details.old_value: Should not be able to add a price on a free product
